localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Push a button and send user stories in your product spec to Jira. Fable will also keep the spec fresh with any changes made to the tickets on Jira. No more copy + pasting from Docs into Jira, no more stale spec!
blogPost.body: Push a button and send user stories in your product spec to Jira. Fable will also keep the spec fresh with any changes made to the tickets on Jira. No more copy + pasting from Docs into Jira, no more stale spec!
blogPost.title: Fable - Sync user stories and requirements between Docs and Jira
blogPost.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: 按下按钮，将产品规格中的用户故事发送到Jira上。Fable还将通过对Jira上的票据所做的任何更改来保持规格的新鲜感。不再需要从Docs复制+粘贴到Jira中，不再有陈旧的规格。
localize.tagline: 在Docs和Jira之间同步用户故事和需求。

localize.description: 按下按鈕，將產品規格中的用戶故事發送到Jira上。Fable還將通過對Jira上的票據所做的任何更改來保持規格的新鮮感。不再需要從Docs複製+粘貼到Jira中，不再有陳舊的規格。
localize.tagline: 在Docs和Jira之間同步用戶故事和需求。

next.excerpt: Use your web apps as true apps with Firework! 🚀 Turn your everyday websites into desktop apps 🕹 Keep them on hand on the Taskbar or Dock 🏁 The apps launch instantly and are immediately ready to use 🎭 Switch between your web apps using familiar methods
next.title: Firework 2 - Easy access to web sites and applications

localize.description: 将您的网络应用程序作为真正的应用程序使用，Firework! 🚀 将您的日常网站变成桌面应用程序 🕹 将它们放在任务栏或停靠点上 🏁 应用程序立即启动，并立即可以使用 🎭 使用熟悉的方法在您的网络应用程序之间切换。
localize.tagline: 轻松访问网站和应用程序

localize.description: 將您的網絡應用程序作爲真正的應用程序使用，Firework! 🚀 將您的日常網站變成桌面應用程序 🕹 將它們放在任務欄或停靠點上 🏁 應用程序立即啓動，並立即可以使用 🎭 使用熟悉的方法在您的網絡應用程序之間切換。
localize.tagline: 輕鬆訪問網站和應用程序
